name: Vitare
description:
Vitare - my very simple first game! The goal is to keep dodging and keep yourself on screen, all the while everything is getting more difficult to oversee with a sense of hecticness.

In theory it takes a maximum of 5 minutes to finish this game. There is only one level and this level takes that long. Can you beat Vitare in 5 minutes? If you can, I'm very impressed, in which case you're obviously the better gamer!

Do not expect too much, I've decided to publish it anyway simply because I thought it was quite fun to play afterward, but I may of course be delusional after playing it myself for so many times while testing it!

Any bugs, hints or tips? Comment and I'll try to fix it! Or tweeting @caelesticode is also a possibility :)
